No offense, but your Transformers background is obviously weak.  As 
established in the Gen-1 series and unchanged in Beast Wars (which is 
based directly on Gen-1), the Autobots and Decepticons existed and 
feuded for millions of years as the sole occupants of Cybertron, not 
three thousand.

The Great War, which ended 300 years before the Beast Wars storyline, 
went on for nine million years.  As well, there were two other major 
wars between Autobots and Decepticons recorded prior to that, with 
periods of peace in between (and before the first war broke out).  
Going by what would be thought of as significant time periods by such 
a society, the Autobot/Decepticon era of Cyberton's history is 
probably at least 12 million years long, and probably closer to 20 
million.

Pardon me for what may look like nitpicking, but if this RPG is going 
to be based on existing Transformers storylines, then proper 
adherence to history has to be maintained.
